bibl.title: Seventeen Beinecke Papyri.
Archiv für Papyrusforschung und verwandte Gebiete

bibl.note: 1. P. CtYBR [P. Yale] Inv. 652. Receipt for the Tax on Weavers. Oxyrhynchus, 19 December 13 BC. - 2. Inv. 736. Private Letter. Provenance unknown, 26 May 25 or 26? - 3. Inv. 1686. Receipt for Rent. Hermopolite nome, 22 September 102. - 4. Inv. 714. Receipt for laographia. Arsinoe, 5 October 192. - 5. Inv. 1388. Receipt for laographia. Arsinoe, 5 June 193. - 6. Inv. 540. Epistolary Close. Provenance unknown, second century. - 7. Inv. 110. Note about a Payment in Grain. Oxyrhynchite nome, second century. - 8. Inv. 683. Note about a Payment in Grain. Hermopolite nome, third century. - 9. Inv. 159. Address label. Oxyrhynchus?, fourth century. - 10. Inv. 2088. Deed of Surety. Provenance unknown, fourth / fifth century. - 11. Inv. 154 verso. List of names. Oxyrhynchus?, fourth / fifth century. - 12. Inv. 1962. Order to supply meat. Oxyrhynchus, 21 (?) December 484. - 13. Inv. 163 (A). Subscriptions to a notarial contract. Provenance unknown, late fifth century. - 14. Inv. 1953. Order to Supply. Oxyrhynchus, 527/528. - 15. Inv. 2039. Order to Supply? Provenance unknown, sixth century. - 16. Inv. 2119. Writing exercise. Provenance unknown, mid seventh century. - 17. Inv. 1685. Receipt for demosion. Arsinoe, later seventh century. - Avec résumé en anglais.
